<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 4%; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(1)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Party A is a limited liability company organized and validly existing as a corporate legal person under Chinese law;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 4%; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(2)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Party B is a wholly foreign owned enterprise organized and validly existing as a corporate legal person under Chinese law; and is mainly engaged in technical support, information technology data processing, and technology consultancy services;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 4%; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(3)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Party A agrees to accept from Party B, and Party B agrees to provide to Party A technical services according to the conditions set forth herein;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<B>
	&nbsp;
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<B>
	Therefore,
</B>
	in consideration of the foregoing premises
	and the mutual promises set forth below, the Parties agree as follows:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 4%; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<B>
	1.
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<B>
	Technical Services
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 24.45PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 24.45PT">
	Party B agrees to provide exclusive technical services
	and support to Party A in accordance with the terms hereof, by using its own human resources and technical expertise. During the
	term of this Agreement, the scope of Party B&rsquo;s technical services to Party A shall include but not limited to the following:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 4%; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(1)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	provide advice and assistance to Party A with respect to the recruiting, transferring and managing of Party A&rsquo;s employees;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 4%; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(2)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	train Party A&rsquo;s employees;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 4%; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(3)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	provide computer hardware and software;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 4%; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(4)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	provide technical services in connection with the well-known brand names owned by Party B;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 4%; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(5)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	provide business counseling for Party A; and
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 4%; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(6)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	provide other services at Party A&rsquo;s request.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>

<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 1PT SOLID">

<A NAME="eolPage153"></A>
<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: ALWAYS; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT">
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</DIV>
<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 4%; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<B>
	2.
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<B>
	Technical Service Fee
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 4%; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(1)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Without Party B&rsquo;s prior written consent, Party A shall have no right to set off the technical service fees hereof against other amounts payable to Party A by Party B hereunder.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 4%; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(2)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	The technical service fees hereunder shall be calculated and verified by the Parties on the basis of the actual technical services provided by Party B, and shall be the sum of the following:
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 4%; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; WIDTH: 4%; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	a.
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	the fee for using and servicing the computer hardware and software, which shall be a certain percentage of Party A&rsquo;s annual sales revenue;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 4%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; WIDTH: 4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	b.
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	the fee for managing the technical service in connection with the brand-names, which shall be a certain percentage of Party A&rsquo;s annual sales revenue;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 4%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; WIDTH: 4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	c.
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	the service charges for Party B&rsquo;s technician employees&rsquo; services provided during their normal business hours, which shall be based on the actual time of service spent and the specific services provided, and which, for a specific technician employee, shall be the product of his particular hourly rate multiplied by the time he actually spent;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 4%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; WIDTH: 4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	d.
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	other fees, at rates agreed upon by the Parties in view of the actual circumstances; and
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 4%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; WIDTH: 4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	e.
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	if party A does not have any profit in a given year, Party B will not charge any service fees for the year.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(3)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	The technical service fees hereunder shall be paid by Party A to Party B monthly (or quarterly / annually) in RMB. Party B may collect in advance annual service fees around mid-year or at other times agreed upon by the Parties.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(4)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Party A shall be responsible for all the tax liabilities arising from the service fees hereunder.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(5)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	To guarantee the payment of the technical service fees hereunder, Party A&rsquo;s shareholders will pledge to Party B all the equity interests they hold in Party A. A separate equity interest pledge agreement will be entered into among Party A&rsquo;s shareholders and Party B.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<B>
	3.
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<B>
	Obligations of Party A
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(1)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	To enable Party B to provide the technical services satisfactorily, Party A shall ensure that it will fully inform Party B of its business arrangements, and will provide to Party B on a regular basis information regarding its business activities.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(2)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Party A shall timely provide to Party B its financial materials and information, including but not limited to Party A&rsquo;s monthly, quarterly and annual financial and accounting statements, budget arrangements and business plans;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(3)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Party A shall promptly report to Party B regarding Party A&rsquo;s involvement in any pending or threatened litigation or arbitration, or regarding any pending or threatened administrative penalty made by related government authority against it; and
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(4)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Party A shall provide to Party B other information at Party B&rsquo;s reasonable request.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<B>
	4.
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<B>
	Restrictive Provisions
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 24.45PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 24.45PT">
	During the term of this Agreement, without Party
	B&rsquo;s prior written consent,
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(1)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Party A shall not accept any third party&rsquo;s any technical services identical or similar to those hereunder;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(2)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Party A shall not transfer, sell, lease, mortgage, pledge or otherwise dispose of its assets (including tangible and intangible assets existing or to be acquired) unless necessary for its normal business operations.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(3)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Party A shall not dissolve or liquidate itself voluntarily, or consolidate with any third party;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(4)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Party A shall not provide guarantee for the debts of any third party;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(5)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Party A shall not distribute dividends to its shareholders or pay back the investments, nor shall it acquire directly or indirectly any shares outstanding or to be issued by back purchase, reclaiming, purchase, or otherwise.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>

<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(6)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Party A shall not have any transactions with any of its affiliates, no matter whether such transactions are within the scope of its normal business operations;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(7)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Party A shall not repay any outstanding debts by advance payment, selective payment or by acquiring asset trust, nor shall it amend or permit amendment of any terms of agreements relating to its debts, or amend its articles of association or business license;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(8)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Party A shall not engage in businesses that beyond its business scope;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(9)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Party A shall not assign part or all of its operation and management rights to any party other than Party B or Party B&rsquo;s designated affiliates, or
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(10)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Party A shall not invest in any other entity or waive its right against any third party.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<B>
	5.
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<B>
	Provisions of Confidentiality
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(1)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Both Parties shall keep in strict confidentiality regarding the negotiation, execution and the contents of this Agreement, and shall not disclose any of the above to any third party, unless required by compulsory provisions of the relevant laws, regulations or government authorities;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(2)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Each Party shall keep in strict confidentiality any trade secret of the other Party obtained in the course of the negotiation, execution and performance of this Agreement, and shall not disclose any of the above to any third party, unless required by compulsory provisions of the relevant laws, regulations or government authorities;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(3)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	The Parties&rsquo; obligation of confidentiality with respect to the above shall survive the termination of this Agreement.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<B>
	6.
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<B>
	Effect and Term of this Agreement
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(1)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	This Agreement shall be concluded after the signatures or seals of the Parties are affixed to it. The Parties agree that this Agreement will become effective as of the execution date.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(2)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	The term of this Agreement shall be ten years starting from the effective date. Unless Party B terminates this Agreement by written notice three months before the expiration of the term, this Agreement shall automatically be renewed for a term of another ten years.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<B>
	7.
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<B>
	Liabilities for Breach
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(1)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	In the event of any breach by either Party, the breaching Party shall be liable to the non-breaching Party for its breach, and shall indemnify the latter for the losses caused by such breach. The non-breaching Party may give the breaching Party reasonable opportunity to cure.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(2)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	If the breaching Party fails to cure within reasonable time, the non-breaching Party shall have the right to terminate this Agreement, and seek damages from the breaching Party for all its actual losses, including but not limited to all reasonable expenses incurred by such non-breaching Party in executing and performing this Agreement (including fees and charges of agents, etc.). The damages shall not be more than the losses which, at the time of execution of this Agreement, the breaching Party foresaw or should have foreseen would result from its breach.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<B>
	8.
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<B>
	Notice
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 24.5PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 24.5PT">
	Unless there is a written notice regarding
	change of address, all notices relating to this Agreement shall be addressed in accordance with the following and delivered by
	personal delivery, fax or registered mail. If notice is given through registered mail, the date on the confirmation slip shall
	be deemed the date of delivery. If notice is given by personal delivery or via fax, the date of actual receipt shall be deemed
	the date of delivery. In the case of delivery via fax, the original copy of the notice shall be sent to the following relevant
	address by personal delivery or by registered mail.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	Party A:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	Beijing HJX Technology Development Co., Ltd.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">

<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	Address: Room 401, Floor 4, Building 21, No.130 Liangjia Dian,
	Haidian District, Beijing

<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<B>
	9.
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<B>
	Governing Law and Dispute Resolution
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(1)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Matters regarding the effectiveness, interpretation and performance of this Agreement, and resolution of disputes arising hereunder, shall be governed by the law of the People&rsquo;s Republic of China.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(2)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Disputes arising out of or in connection with this Agreement shall first be resolved through consultation between the Parties. If a dispute cannot be resolved within 30 days after consultation begins, either Party may bring the dispute to the China International Economic and Trade Arbitration Commission in Beijing for arbitration under the auspices of three arbitrators designated in accordance with its rules. The arbitration award shall be final and binding upon the parties.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>

<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<B>
	10.
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<B>
	Miscellaneous Provisions
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(1)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Without the prior written consent of the other Party, no Party shall assign any part of its rights and obligations hereunder to a third party, except that Party B may transfer rights and obligations hereunder to any of its affiliates.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">

<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(2)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	The invalidity or unenforceability of any provision or part of this Agreement shall not affect the validity or enforceability of any other provision hereof.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(3)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Any successor to a Party hereto shall assume the rights and obligations of such Party as if it were a Party to this Agreement.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">

<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(4)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	This Agreement is executed in two original copies, with one for each of the Parties. The Parties may execute more counterparts if necessary.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;

<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(5)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	This Agreement constitutes the entire agreement between the Parties with respect to the subject matter hereof, and supersedes all oral and written understandings and agreements between the Parties with respect to the subject matter prior to the effectiveness of this Agreement. This Agreement shall not be amended without the consent of Party B&rsquo;s auditing committee or other independent institution of its board of directors.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>

<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: RIGHT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: RIGHT">
<B>
	EXHIBIT 4.7
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<B>
	&nbsp;
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<B>
	OPERATION AND MANAGEMENT AGREEMENT
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	This Operation and Management Agreement (the &ldquo;
<B>
	Agreement
</B>
	&rdquo;)
	is entered into in 2016 in Shanghai, China among:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">

	&nbsp;
</B>

<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	Party A, Party B and Party C are hereinafter collectively referred
	to as the &ldquo;Parties&rdquo; and individually as a &ldquo;Party.&rdquo;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<B>
	Whereas:
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 4%; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(1)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Party A is a wholly foreign owned enterprise established in China;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 4%; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(2)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Party B is a limited liability company registered in China with an independent legal person status;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 4%; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(3)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Party A and Party B have established business relationship by entering into an Exclusive Technical Services Agreement (the &ldquo;
<B>
	Service Agreement
</B>
	&rdquo;);
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE">

<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(4)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Party A and Party C have entered into a certain Equity Pledge Agreement (the &ldquo;
<B>
	Equity Pledge Agreement
</B>
	&rdquo;) to ensure Party B&rsquo;s payment of the technical service fee to Party A based on the Service Agreement;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 4%; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(5)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Pursuant to the Service Agreement, Party B shall pay to Party A certain technical service fee. However, up to now, the technical service fee is still not yet paid and the daily operation of Party B has a material effect on its ability to pay to Party A the technical service fee;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 4%; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(6)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Party C constitutes the shareholders of Party B and has a 100% equity interest in Party B. Kuan Song and Pan Zong hold a 90% equity interest and a 10% equity interest respectively in HJX Technology.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	NOW THEREFORE, in consideration of the foregoing premises and
	the mutual agreements contained herein, the Parties hereby agree as follows:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 4%; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	1.
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	To ensure Party B&rsquo;s daily operation and management, Party A agrees to provide guarantee for Party B&rsquo;s obligations to a third party under any contract or agreement entered into between Party B and a third party or other transactions at the request of a third party and then a guarantee agreement will be entered into. Party B agrees to provide counter-guarantee with its accounts receivable and its assets in connection with the aforesaid Party A&rsquo;s guarantee.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>

	&nbsp;

<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: ALWAYS; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT">
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</DIV>
<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 4%; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	2.
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	As a condition precedent to Article 1 hereof and to ensure the performance of other operation agreements between Party A and Party B (for example, the payment of Party B&rsquo;s technical service fee), Party B and Party C (i.e., Party B&rsquo;s shareholder) hereby agree that without the prior written consent of Party A, Party B shall not carry out any transaction which may materially affect its assets, obligations, rights or operation or management, including, but not limited to:
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 4%; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; WIDTH: 4%; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(1)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	borrow money from or assume debt for any third party;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 4%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; WIDTH: 4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(2)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	purchase or sell any assets or rights or interests from or to any third party, including, but not limited to, any intellectual property rights;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 4%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; WIDTH: 4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(3)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	provide any third party with guarantee interest in Party B&rsquo;s assets or intellectual property rights;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 4%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; WIDTH: 4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(4)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	transfer to any third party any agreement with respect to Party B&rsquo;s business.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	3.
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	To ensure the performance of other operation agreements between Party A and Party B (for example, the payment of Party B&rsquo;s technical service fee), Party B and Party C (i.e., Party B&rsquo;s shareholder) hereby agree to accept company policies and guidance provided by Party A from time to time with respect to Party B&rsquo;s employment and dismissal of employees, daily operation and management and financial management policies.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	4.
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Party B and Party C (i.e., Party B&rsquo;s shareholder) hereby agree that: (1)&nbsp;the persons appointed by Party A or its affiliates will attend and exercise the voting right at the meeting of shareholder of Party B on behalf of Party C (i.e., Party B&rsquo;s shareholder);&nbsp;(2) Party B will appoint candidates nominated by Party A or its affiliates as Party B&rsquo;s directors and undertake that the constitution of the board of directors of Party B and the directors&rsquo; rights shall be in consistency with those of the board of directors of Party A; (3)&nbsp;Party B will appoint persons employed and designated by Party A as Party B&rsquo;s general manager and other senior management persons; (4)&nbsp;Party B and Party C will amend Party B&rsquo;s articles of association in accordance with the above agreement. If such candidates as nominated by Party A or its affiliate no longer act as a director of Party A or its affiliate or are no longer employed by Party A or its affiliate, whether they are voluntarily resigned or dismissed by Party A, they will accordingly no longer hold any positions in Party B. In such case, Party B shall appoint other management persons employed or designated by Party A.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	5.
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Party B and Party C (i.e., Party B&rsquo;s shareholder) hereby agree and acknowledge that, in addition to relevant provisions in Article 1 hereof, if Party B needs to fulfill any guarantee or needs any guarantee for its working capital to be borrowed during its operation, Party B shall first apply to Party A for such guarantee. In such case, Party A shall have the right but no obligation to provide Party B with proper guarantee. If Party A does not provide such guarantee, it shall promptly send a written notice to Party B for Party B&rsquo;s seeking guarantee from a third party. If Party A is willing to provide guarantee, Party A will enter into a contract with Party B or the parties may otherwise enter into a guarantee agreement. Party A&rsquo;s warrant hereunder does not by itself constitute Party A&rsquo;s obligation to act as a guarantor under any guarantee agreement which has not yet been signed by Party&nbsp;A.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	6.
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	If any of the agreements between Party A and Party B is expired or terminated, Party A shall have the right but no obligation to terminate all of the agreements between Party A and Party B, including but not limited to the Service Agreement.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	7.
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	This Agreement may be amended or supplemented only by agreement in writing executed by each of the Parties. Any such amendment or supplement is an integral part of this Agreement with the same force and effect as this Agreement.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	8.
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	Notice
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	Unless there is a written notice regarding change of address,
	all notices relating to this Agreement shall be addressed to the following address and delivered by personal delivery, fax or registered
	mail. If notice is given through registered mail, the date on the confirmation slip shall be deemed the date of delivery. If notice
	is given by personal delivery or via fax, the date of actual receipt shall be deemed the date of delivery. In the case of delivery
	via fax, the original copy of the notice shall be sent to the following relevant address by personal delivery or by registered
	mail.
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">

	10.
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Disputes arising out of or in connection with this Agreement shall first be resolved through consultation among the Parties. If a dispute cannot be resolved within 30 days after consultation begins, any Party may bring the dispute to the China International Economic and Trade Arbitration Commission in Beijing for arbitration under the auspices of three arbitrators designated in accordance with its rules. The arbitration award shall be final and binding upon the Parties.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>

	This Agreement shall be concluded after it is signed or affixed seals by the Parties. The Parties agree that this Agreement shall take effect as of the execution date. During the valid existence of Party A and Party B hereunder, unless this Agreement is early terminated in accordance with its relevant provisions herein, this Agreement shall continue to be valid for ten years from the effective date hereof. The term of this Agreement shall be automatically extended for another ten years except Party A may terminate this Agreement in writing three months before its expiration.
</FONT>
</TD>

	This Equity Pledge Agreement (hereinafter
	referred to as &ldquo;
<B>
	this Agreement
</B>
	&rdquo;) is entered into in 2016 in Shanghai, the People&rsquo;s Republic of China (hereinafter
	referred to as the &ldquo;
<B>
	PRC
</B>
	&rdquo;) by and between the following parties:

	(1)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Party A is a wholly foreign-owned enterprise duly organized and validly existing under the laws of the People&rsquo;s Republic of China, which has the status of an independent legal person and is engaged mainly in technical support, information technology data processing, and technology consultancy services;
</FONT>

	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; WIDTH: 8%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(2)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Party B is Kuan Song and Pan Zong, shareholders of Beijing HJX Technology Development Co., Ltd. (&ldquo;Beijing HJX Technology&rdquo;), who hold 90% and 10% of the equity interest in Beijing HJX Technology, respectively, corresponding to a cash contribution of RMB45 million and RMB5 million into Beijing HJX Technology;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; WIDTH: 8%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(3)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Party A and Beijing HJX Technology entered into a certain Exclusive Technology Services Agreement (hereinafter referred to as the &ldquo;
<B>
	Services Agreement
</B>
	&rdquo;) on [*], 2016, and the Parties know the contents of that agreement and have a thorough understanding of its meaning;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; WIDTH: 8%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(4)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Party B agrees to pledge to Party A all the equity interest it holds in Beijing HJX Technology as security for the payment by Beijing HJX Technology of the fee for the services Party A shall provide under the Services Agreement;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; WIDTH: 8%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(5)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	The Parties entered into a certain Loan Agreement (hereinafter referred to as the &ldquo;
<B>
	Loan Agreement
</B>
	&rdquo;) on [*], 2016 and a certain Operation and Management Agreement (hereinafter referred to as the &ldquo;
<B>
	Management
</B>
<B>
	Agreement
</B>
	&rdquo;)
<B>
</B>
	on [*], 2016. Party B shall pledge all the equity interest it holds in Beijing HJX Technology to Party A as security for Party B&rsquo;s performance of its obligations under the Loan Agreement and the Management Agreement in addition to security for the payment by Beijing HJX Technology of the fee for the services Party A shall provide under the Services Agreement.
<B>
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 24.5PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>

<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 1PT SOLID">
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage160"></A>
<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: ALWAYS; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT">
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT">
	&nbsp;

</DIV>
<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 24.5PT">
	In consideration of the premises as set
	forth above as well as the mutual undertakings as set forth below, the Parties hereby agree to the following:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 13%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<B>
	Article&nbsp;1
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<B>
	Pledge of Equity Interest
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; WIDTH: 8%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(1)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	Party B agrees to pledge to Party A all the equity interest
	it holds in Beijing HJX Technology.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	Kuan Song, as a pledger, agrees to pledge the equity interest
	in an amount of RMB45 million to the pledgee as security for repayment of the principal in an amount of RMB39.6 million by the
	debtor to pledgee under the Loan Agreement.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	Pan Zong, as a pledger, agrees to pledge the equity interest
	in an amount of RMB5 million to pledgee as security for repayment of the principal in an amount of RMB4.4 million by the debtor
	to pledgee under the Loan Agreement.
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; WIDTH: 8%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(2)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	If Party B proposes to transfer to any third party the equity interest it holds in Beijing HJX Technology, it shall provide such third party with all the true information on such equity pledge and such third party shall automatically inherit all the rights and obligations thereunder.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 13%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<B>
	Article&nbsp;2
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<B>
	Delivery and Custody of the Equity Interest to Be Pledged Hereunder
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; WIDTH: 8%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(1)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Within seven business days of execution hereof, Party B shall hand over the certificates in evidence of its investment in the equity interest of Beijing HJX Technology and the shareholders&rsquo; register of Beijing HJX Technology it holds to Party A for its keeping.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; WIDTH: 8%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(2)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	During the term of the equity pledge hereunder, any income that may be derived from such equity interest shall belong to Party A.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 13%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<B>
	Article&nbsp;3
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<B>
	Party B&rsquo;s Representations and Warranties
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; WIDTH: 8%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(1)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Party B has fully performed its obligation to make a capital contribution to Beijing HJX Technology in accordance with the
<I>
	Company Law of the People&rsquo;s Republic of China
</I>
	and the articles of association of Beijing HJX Technology and it is the lawful owner of the equity interest to be pledged hereunder.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; WIDTH: 8%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(2)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	No third party shall interfere in Party A&rsquo;s exercise of the pledge right hereunder.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; WIDTH: 8%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(3)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Party A shall have the right to dispose of or transfer the equity interest to be pledged hereunder in accordance with the provisions hereof.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; WIDTH: 8%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(4)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Apart from the pledge hereunder, Party B has not created any other pledge or encumbrance on the equity interest to be pledged hereunder.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 13%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<B>
	Article&nbsp;4
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<B>
	Party B&rsquo;s Undertakings
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	For Party A&rsquo;s benefit, Party B undertakes that, during
	the term hereof,
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; WIDTH: 8%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(1)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	without Party A&rsquo;s previous written consent, it shall not transfer the equity interest to be pledged hereunder or create any other pledge or encumbrance on such equity interest;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; WIDTH: 8%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(2)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	within seven business days of execution hereof, it shall complete the procedure for registration of this Agreement and the pledge of the equity interest hereunder with the authority in charge of industrial and commercial administration and any other competent authority with which Beijing HJX Technology registered its establishment;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; WIDTH: 8%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(3)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	it shall comply with all the laws and regulations applicable to the pledge of the equity interest hereunder and, within five days of receipt of any notice, order or suggestion the relevant authorities issue or make, forward such notice, order or suggestion to Party A and comply with them at Party A&rsquo;s reasonable request;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>

<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 1PT SOLID">
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage161"></A>
<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: ALWAYS; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT">
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</DIV>
<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; WIDTH: 8%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(4)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	If there occurs any such event as has adversely affected, or will adversely affect, Party A&rsquo;s pledge right or any of Party B&rsquo;s warranties or other obligations hereunder, it shall promptly notify Party A of such occurrence;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; WIDTH: 8%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(5)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	it has not taken or, without Party A&rsquo;s written consent, will not take any action that will adversely affect the status of Party B&rsquo;s assets, such as raising of loans, provision of security, or purchase or sale of any major assets;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; WIDTH: 8%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(6)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	none of Party B or any of its successors or representatives or any other third party will interfere in, or cause any damage to, the pledge of the equity interest to Party A hereunder; and
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 5%; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 8%; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(7)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	it will comply with and perform all of its warranties, undertakings, agreements and representations hereunder and the provisions hereof. If Party B violates, or fails fully to perform, any of the provisions hereof, Party A shall have the right to require that Party B compensate it for any losses it may suffer as a result. &nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 8%; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(8)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	it will pledge to Party A the additional equity in Beijing HJX Technology that it obtains after increasing capital contribution to Beijing HJX Technology or purchasing equity in Beijing HJX Technology.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 13%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<B>
	Article&nbsp;5
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<B>
	Realization of the Pledge Right
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; WIDTH: 8%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(1)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Without Party A&rsquo;s previous written consent, Party B shall not transfer the equity interest to be pledged hereunder before Beijing HJX Technology has paid in full the fee for the technical services under the Services Agreement within a reasonable time limit and Party B has performed its obligations under the Loan Agreement and the Management Agreement.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; WIDTH: 8%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(2)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Party A shall notify Party B in writing of its exercise of the pledge right hereunder;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; WIDTH: 8%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(3)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	If, during the term of the pledge hereunder, Beijing HJX Technology fails to pay all or part of the fee for the technical services under the Services Agreement within a reasonable time limit as specified therein or Party B fails to perform its obligations under the Loan Agreement and the Management Agreement in the time limits as specified therein, Party A shall have the priority to be compensated with the money into which the equity interest to be pledged hereunder will be converted or with the proceeds from the auction or sale of such equity interest in accordance with the provisions hereof.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; WIDTH: 8%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(4)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Party B shall not obstruct Party A from exercising the pledge right in accordance with the provisions of the preceding paragraph. Instead, Party B shall extend active cooperation and assistance to Party A in exercising such right to ensure that it will succeed in realizing such right.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 13%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<B>
	Article&nbsp;6
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<B>
	Transfer
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; WIDTH: 8%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(1)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Without Party A&rsquo;s previous consent, Party B shall have no right to transfer the rights or obligations hereunder to any third party or authorize any third party to assume the rights and obligations hereunder on its behalf.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; WIDTH: 8%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(2)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Party A shall have the right to transfer all or part of the rights and obligations under the Services Agreement to any third party (either a natural person or legal person) at any time, in which case, such third party shall assume the rights and obligations hereunder as if it were a Party hereto. At Party A&rsquo;s request, Party B shall execute an agreement and/or documents in connection with the aforesaid transfer.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 13%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<B>
	Article&nbsp;7
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<B>
	Effectiveness and Term of this Agreement
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; WIDTH: 8%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(1)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	This Agreement shall formally become effective after the Parties have affixed their signatures or seals hereto. The Parties agree that this Agreement will become effective on the date of execution.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
