	Parties
</B>
	&rdquo; and individually as a &ldquo;
<B>
	Party
</B>
	&rdquo;.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<B>
	&nbsp;
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<B>
	Whereas:
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 5%; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; WIDTH: 8%; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(1)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Party A is a wholly foreign-owned enterprise duly organized and validly existing under the laws of the People&rsquo;s Republic of China, which has the status of an independent legal person and is engaged mainly in development of computer software and hardware, information technology data processing, and technology consultancy services;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; WIDTH: 8%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(2)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Party B is Kuan Song and Pan Zong, shareholders of Shanghai Acorn Network Technology Development Co., Ltd. (&ldquo;
<B>
	Acorn Network Technology
</B>
	&rdquo;), who hold 90% and 10% of the equity interest in Acorn Network Technology, respectively;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; WIDTH: 8%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(3)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Party A and Acorn Network Technology entered into a certain Exclusive Technology Services Agreement (hereinafter referred to as the &ldquo;
<B>
	Services Agreement
</B>
	&rdquo;) on May 27, 2015 , and the Parties know the contents of that agreement and have a thorough understanding of its meaning;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; WIDTH: 8%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(4)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Party B agrees to pledge to Party A all the equity interest it holds in Acorn Network Technology as security for the payment by Acorn Network Technology of the fee for the services Party A shall provide under the Services Agreement;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; WIDTH: 8%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(5)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	The Parties entered into a certain Loan Agreement (hereinafter referred to as the &ldquo;
<B>
	Loan Agreement
</B>
	&rdquo;) on May 27, 2015 and a certain Operation and Management Agreement (hereinafter referred to as the &ldquo;
<B>
	Management
</B>
<B>
	Agreement
</B>
	&rdquo;)
<B>
</B>
	on May 27, 2015. Party B shall pledge all the equity interest it holds in Acorn Network Technology to Party A as security for Party B&rsquo;s performance of its obligations under the Loan Agreement and the Management Agreement in addition to security for the payment by Acorn Network Technology of the fee for the services Party A shall provide under the Services Agreement.
<B>
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 24.5PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>

<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 24.5PT">
	In consideration of the premises as set
	forth above as well as the mutual undertakings as set forth below, the Parties hereby agree to the following:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 13%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<B>
	Article&nbsp;1
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<B>
	Pledge of Equity Interest
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; WIDTH: 8%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(1)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Party B agrees to pledge to Party A all the equity interest it holds in Acorn Network Technology.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; WIDTH: 8%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(2)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	If Party B proposes to transfer to any third party the equity interest it holds in Acorn Network Technology, it shall provide such third party with all the true information on such equity pledge and such third party shall automatically inherit all the rights and obligations thereunder.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 13%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<B>
	Article&nbsp;2
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<B>
	Delivery and Custody of the Equity Interest to Be Pledged Hereunder
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; WIDTH: 8%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(1)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Within seven business days of execution hereof, Party B shall hand over the certificates in evidence of its investment in the equity interest of Acorn Network Technology and the shareholders&rsquo; register of Acorn Network Technology it holds to Party A for its keeping.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; WIDTH: 8%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(2)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	During the term of the equity pledge hereunder, any income that may be derived from such equity interest shall belong to Party A.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">

<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<B>
	Article&nbsp;3
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<B>
	Party B&rsquo;s Representations and Warranties
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; WIDTH: 8%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(1)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Party B has fully performed its obligation to make a capital contribution to Acorn Network Technology in accordance with the
<I>
	Company Law of the People&rsquo;s Republic of China
</I>
	and the articles of association of Acorn Network Technology and it is the lawful owner of the equity interest to be pledged hereunder.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; WIDTH: 8%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(2)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	No third party shall interfere in Party A&rsquo;s exercise of the pledge right hereunder.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; WIDTH: 8%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(3)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Party A shall have the right to dispose of or transfer the equity interest to be pledged hereunder in accordance with the provisions hereof.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">

<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; WIDTH: 8%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(4)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Apart from the pledge hereunder, Party B has not created any other pledge or encumbrance on the equity interest to be pledged hereunder.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">

<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<B>
	Article&nbsp;4
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<B>
	Party B&rsquo;s Undertakings
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	For Party A&rsquo;s benefit, Party B undertakes that, during
	the term hereof,
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; WIDTH: 8%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(1)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	without Party A&rsquo;s previous written consent, it shall not transfer the equity interest to be pledged hereunder or create any other pledge or encumbrance on such equity interest;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; WIDTH: 8%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(2)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	within seven business days of execution hereof, it shall complete the procedure for registration of this Agreement and the pledge of the equity interest hereunder with the authority in charge of industrial and commercial administration and any other competent authority with which Acorn Network Technology registered its establishment;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; WIDTH: 8%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(3)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	it shall comply with all the laws and regulations applicable to the pledge of the equity interest hereunder and, within five days of receipt of any notice, order or suggestion the relevant authorities issue or make, forward such notice, order or suggestion to Party A and comply with them at Party A&rsquo;s reasonable request;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; WIDTH: 8%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(4)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	If there occurs any such event as has adversely affected, or will adversely affect, Party A&rsquo;s pledge right or any of Party B&rsquo;s warranties or other obligations hereunder, it shall promptly notify Party A of such occurrence;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; WIDTH: 8%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(1)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	it has not taken or, without Party A&rsquo;s written consent, will not take any action that will adversely affect the status of Party B&rsquo;s assets, such as raising of loans, provision of security, or purchase or sale of any major assets;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; WIDTH: 8%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(2)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	none of Party B or any of its successors or representatives or any other third party will interfere in, or cause any damage to, the pledge of the equity interest to Party A hereunder; and
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;

</DIV>
<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; WIDTH: 8%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(3)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	it will comply with and perform all of its warranties, undertakings, agreements and representations hereunder and the provisions hereof. If Party B violates, or fails fully to perform, any of the provisions hereof, Party A shall have the right to require that Party B compensate it for any losses it may suffer as a result.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(4)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	it will pledge to Party A the additional equity in Acorn Network Technology that it obtains after increasing capital contribution to Acorn Network Technology or purchasing equity in Acorn Network Technology.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 13%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<B>
	Article&nbsp;5
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<B>
	Realization of the Pledge Right
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; WIDTH: 8%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(1)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Without Party A&rsquo;s previous written consent, Party B shall not transfer the equity interest to be pledged hereunder before Acorn Network Technology has paid in full the fee for the technical services under the Services Agreement within a reasonable time limit and Party B has performed its obligations under the Loan Agreement and the Management Agreement.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; WIDTH: 8%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(2)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Party A shall notify Party B in writing of its exercise of the pledge right hereunder;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; WIDTH: 8%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(3)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	If, during the term of the pledge hereunder, Acorn Network Technology fails to pay all or part of the fee for the technical services under the Services Agreement within a reasonable time limit as specified therein or Party B fails to perform its obligations under the Loan Agreement and the Management Agreement in the time limits as specified therein, Party A shall have the priority to be compensated with the money into which the equity interest to be pledged hereunder will be converted or with the proceeds from the auction or sale of such equity interest in accordance with the provisions hereof.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; WIDTH: 8%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(4)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Party B shall not obstruct Party A from exercising the pledge right in accordance with the provisions of the preceding paragraph. Instead, Party B shall extend active cooperation and assistance to Party A in exercising such right to ensure that it will succeed in realizing such right.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 13%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<B>
	Article&nbsp;6
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<B>
	Transfer
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; WIDTH: 8%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(1)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Without Party A&rsquo;s previous consent, Party B shall have no right to transfer the rights or obligations hereunder to any third party or authorize any third party to assume the rights and obligations hereunder on its behalf.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; WIDTH: 8%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(2)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Party A shall have the right to transfer all or part of the rights and obligations under the Services Agreement to any third party (either a natural person or legal person) at any time, in which case, such third party shall assume the rights and obligations hereunder as if it were a Party hereto. At Party A&rsquo;s request, Party B shall execute an agreement and/or documents in connection with the aforesaid transfer.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 13%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<B>
	Article&nbsp;7
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<B>
	Effectiveness and Term of this Agreement
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; WIDTH: 8%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(1)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	This Agreement shall formally become effective after the Parties have affixed their signatures or seals hereto. The Parties agree that this Agreement will become effective on the date of execution.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; WIDTH: 8%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(2)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	The term of the pledge of the equity interest hereunder shall be 10 years, starting from the effective date hereof. The term of this Agreement shall automatically be extended for 10 years upon expiration of such term, unless Party A notifies Party B in writing of its intention to terminate this Agreement in the three months prior to the expiration of the term of this Agreement.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 13%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<B>
	Article&nbsp;8
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<B>
	Liability for Breach of Contract
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; WIDTH: 8%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(1)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	If any of the following events occurs, such an event shall be deemed to be a breach of this Agreement:
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 13%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; WIDTH: 4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	a.
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Acorn Network Technology fails to pay in full the fee for the technology services under the exclusive Services Agreement within a reasonable time limit as specified therein;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>

<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 13%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; WIDTH: 4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	b.
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Party B fails fully to perform its obligations under the Loan Agreement;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 13%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; WIDTH: 4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	c.
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Any of the representations or warranties Party B makes in Article 3 hereof proves to be inconsistent with any of the major facts or false and/or Party B is out of compliance with any of the warranties it makes in Article 3 hereof;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 13%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; WIDTH: 4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	d.
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Party B is out of compliance with any of the undertakings it makes in Article 4 hereof;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 13%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; WIDTH: 4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	e.
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Party B is in violation of any of the provisions hereof;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 13%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; WIDTH: 4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	f.
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Without Party A&rsquo;s previous written consent, Party B has relinquished or transferred the equity interest that has been pledged hereunder;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 13%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; WIDTH: 4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	g.
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	In the case that Party B has got any loan from a third party or provided any guaranty for a third party, is required to pay any compensation to a third party, has made an undertaking to a third party, or is under any other liability to a third party,
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 17%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; WIDTH: 4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(i)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Party B is required to repay such loan, perform such guaranty or undertaking, pay such compensation, or discharge such liability ahead of time; or
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 17%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; WIDTH: 4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(ii)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Party B is unable to discharge any of the aforesaid liabilities when it becomes due so that Party A believes that Party B&rsquo;s capacity to perform this Agreement is adversely affected as a result;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 13%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; WIDTH: 4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	h.
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Party B is unable to repay its general debts or any other debts;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 13%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; WIDTH: 4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	i.
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Any new laws or regulations have been promulgated that have rendered this Agreement illegal or Party B unable to continue to perform its obligations hereunder;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 13%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; WIDTH: 4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	j.
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	All the approvals, licenses, consents or authorizations of the government authorities that have made this Agreement performable and effective are revoked, terminated, have become invalid, or have been substantially modified;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 13%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; WIDTH: 4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	k.
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Any adverse change has occurred to the assets under Party B&rsquo;s ownership so that Party A believes that Party B&rsquo;s capacity to perform this Agreement is adversely affected as a result;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 13%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; WIDTH: 4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	l.
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	The successor to, or manager of, Acorn Network Technology can only perform part of the obligation to pay the fee under the Services Agreement or refuses to perform such obligation; or
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 13%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; WIDTH: 4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	m.
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	There occurs any other event in which Party A cannot exercise the pledge right hereunder.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; WIDTH: 8%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(2)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	As soon as Party B is informed, or has become aware, that any of the events as described in the preceding paragraph is likely to occur, it shall notify Party A in writing of such likelihood. Except as any of the breaches of contract as described in the preceding paragraph has been successfully remedied to Party A&rsquo;s satisfaction, at the time of such occurrence or any time thereafter, Party A may serve a notice of such breach on Party B and dispose of the equity interest to be pledged hereunder in accordance with the provisions of Article 5 hereof.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; WIDTH: 8%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(3)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	If either Party is in breach of any of the provisions hereof, the breaching party shall be liable to the non-breaching party for breach of contract and compensate the non-breaching party for any losses it may suffer as a result of such breach. The non-breaching party may grant the breaching party a certain period of grace, in which the breaching party shall be required to remedy such breach.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; WIDTH: 8%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(4)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	If the breaching party fails to take any remedial measures within a reasonable period of grace, the non-breaching party shall have the right to terminate this Agreement and require that the breaching party compensate it for any actual losses it may suffer as a result, including but not limited to all the reasonable expenses the non-breaching party may incur in connection with the execution and performance hereof (including expenses and costs incurred in connection with the engagement of the various intermediary agencies), provided, however, that such compensation shall not exceed losses that, at the time of execution hereof, the breaching party foresaw or should have reasonably foreseen its breach hereof might cause to the other Party.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>

<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<B>
	Article&nbsp;9
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<B>
	Governing Law and Settlement of Disputes
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; WIDTH: 8%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(1)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	The validity, interpretation and performance hereof and settlement of disputes hereunder shall be governed by the laws of the People&rsquo;s Republic of China.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; WIDTH: 8%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(2)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	If any dispute arises out of the performance of this Agreement or in connection with this Agreement, the Parties shall settle such dispute through consultation. If such dispute fails to be settled though consultation within 30 days, either Party may submit it to the China International Economic and Trade Arbitration Commission in Beijing for settlement by arbitration by three arbitrators appointed by this commission in accordance with its rules. The award of the arbitration tribunal shall be final and binding on both of the Parties.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 13%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<B>
	Article&nbsp;10
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<B>
	Notices
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 24.5PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 24.5PT">
	Notices relating to this Agreement shall
	be delivered to the following addresses by hand or sent by facsimile or registered mail except as any of such addresses is changed
	by a written notice. If sent by registered mail, a notice shall be deemed given on the date indicated on the return receipt for
	registered mail; if delivered by hand or sent by facsimile, a notice shall be deemed given on the date it is received. If a notice
	is sent by facsimile to any of the following addresses, the original of such notice shall promptly be delivered by hand or sent
	by registered mail to such notice:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 24.5PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 24.5PT">
	If to Acorn Information Technology (Shanghai)
	Co., Ltd.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 24.5PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 24.5PT">
	The address: Room 669-05, No.&nbsp;2 Building,
	No.&nbsp;351 Guoshoujing Road, Zhangjiang High-tech Park, Shanghai
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 24.5PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 24.5PT">

</B>
</FONT>
</TD>

<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 5%">

</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; WIDTH: 8%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(1)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Within seven days after the effective date hereof, the Parties hereto shall carry out the procedure for registration of the pledge of the equity interest hereunder with the authority in charge of industrial and commercial administration.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; WIDTH: 8%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(2)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Expenses that may be incurred in connection with the execution and performance hereof, including but not limited to legal fees and the fee for registration of the pledge of the equity interest hereunder, shall be borne by Party B.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">

</TD>

<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(3)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Neither Party shall unilaterally make any modification or amendment in this Agreement without mutual agreement of both parties.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;

	(4)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	This Agreement is executed in four originals, one of which shall be kept by each of the Parties hereto and filed with the Administration for Industry and Commerce. The Parties hereto may execute duplicates of this Agreement separately when necessary.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">

</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	This Agreement constitutes the entire agreement between the Parties with respect to the subject matter hereof and supersedes all oral or written understandings and agreements the Parties reached with respect to such subject matter before this Agreement becomes effective. This Agreement shall not be amended without approval of Party A&rsquo;s audit committee or any other independent agency under Party A&rsquo;s board of directors.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>

	C will each be referred to as &ldquo;a Party&rdquo; herein and collectively as &ldquo;the Parties&rdquo;.

<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<B>
	Whereas
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BACKGROUND-COLOR: WHITE; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 6%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Party B constitutes two shareholders of Acorn Network Technology, with Kuan Song holding 90% of its equity, and Pan Zong holding 10%;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BACKGROUND-COLOR: WHITE; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 6%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(1)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Party A and Party B have entered into a Loan Agreement dated May 27, 2015 (the &ldquo;
<B>
	Loan Agreement
</B>
	&rdquo;), pursuant to which Party A shall provide loans to Party B for Party B to set up Acorn Network Technology or to acquire Acorn Network Technology&rsquo;s equity or to increase Acorn Network Technology&rsquo;s registered capital;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BACKGROUND-COLOR: WHITE; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 6%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(2)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Party A and Party C entered into an Exclusive Technical Service Agreement dated May 27, 2015 (the &ldquo;
<B>
	Service Agreement
</B>
	&rdquo;), pursuant to which Party A shall provide to Party C technical services;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BACKGROUND-COLOR: WHITE; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 6%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(3)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Party A and Party B entered into an Equity Pledge Agreement dated May 27, 2015&nbsp;&nbsp;(the &ldquo;Pledge Agreement&rdquo;), pursuant to which Party B shall pledge all its equity interest in Party C (including Party B&rsquo;s equity interest in the capital increase of Party C) to Party A.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<B>
	&nbsp;
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<B>
	Therefore,
</B>
	&nbsp;in consideration of the foregoing premises
	and the mutual promises set forth below, the Parties agree as follows:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BACKGROUND-COLOR: WHITE; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 6%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<B>
	1.
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<B>
	Equity Purchase
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BACKGROUND-COLOR: WHITE; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 6%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(1)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Party B hereby irrevocably grants to Party A the right to purchase at any time, or designate any third party&nbsp;&nbsp;to purchase, all or part of Party B&rsquo;s equity interest in Party C, provided permitted under Chinese laws and regulations. Apart from Party A or any third party designated by Party A, no other person shall have the right to purchase such equity interest. Party C agrees to such grant by Party B to Party A. For the purpose of this Agreement, a &ldquo;third party&rdquo; or a &ldquo;person&rdquo; may be a natural person, company, partnership, enterprise, trust agency or other non-corporate entity.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BACKGROUND-COLOR: WHITE; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 6%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(2)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	To the extent permitted under Chinese laws and regulations, Party A shall exercise such right to purchase the equity interest by written notice to Party B specifying the amount of equity to be purchased;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<!-- FIELD: PAGE; SEQUENCE: 1 -->
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 1PT SOLID">
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</DIV>

<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: ALWAYS; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT">
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</DIV>
<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BACKGROUND-COLOR: WHITE; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 6%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(3)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Unless otherwise required under Chinese laws and regulations, the transaction price for the equity transfer hereunder shall be the lowest price permitted under Chinese law;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BACKGROUND-COLOR: WHITE; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 6%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(4)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	All the money obtained by Party B from transfer of its interest in Party C hereunder shall be used to satisfy Party B&rsquo;s payment obligations under the Loan Agreement.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BACKGROUND-COLOR: WHITE; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 6%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<B>
	2.
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<B>
	Representations and Warranties
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BACKGROUND-COLOR: WHITE; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 6%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(1)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Party B and Party C hereby warrants that, with respect to Party C,
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BACKGROUND-COLOR: WHITE; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 6%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; WIDTH: 7%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	a.
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	without Party A&rsquo;s prior written consent, they shall not supplement or amend its articles of association or rules of the company in any manner, nor shall they increase or decrease its registered capital or change its shareholding structure in any manner;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BACKGROUND-COLOR: WHITE; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 6%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; WIDTH: 7%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	b.
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	they will prudently and effectively maintain its business operations according to good financial and business standards;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BACKGROUND-COLOR: WHITE; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 6%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; WIDTH: 7%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	c.
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	without Party A&rsquo;s prior written consent, they shall not transfer, mortgage or otherwise dispose of the lawful rights and interests to and in its assets or incomes, nor shall they encumber their assets and income in any way that would affect Party A&rsquo;s security interest;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BACKGROUND-COLOR: WHITE; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 6%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; WIDTH: 7%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	d.
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	they shall not incur or succeed to any debts, nor shall they provide guarantee for or permit the existence of any debts, except those that are incurred during its normal business operation or agreed to or confirmed by Party A in advance;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BACKGROUND-COLOR: WHITE; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 6%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; WIDTH: 7%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	e.
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	without Party A&rsquo;s prior written consent, they shall not enter into any material contract (exceeding RMB1,000,000 in value), unless it is necessary for the company&rsquo;s normal business operation;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BACKGROUND-COLOR: WHITE; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 6%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; WIDTH: 7%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	f.
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	without Party A&rsquo;s prior written consent, they shall not provide any loans or guarantee to any third party;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BACKGROUND-COLOR: WHITE; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 6%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; WIDTH: 7%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	g.
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	at Party A&rsquo;s request, they shall provide Party A with all information regarding Party C&rsquo;s business operation and financial condition;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BACKGROUND-COLOR: WHITE; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 6%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; WIDTH: 7%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	h.
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	they shall purchase insurance from insurance companies acceptable to Party A in such amounts and of such kinds as are customary in the region among companies doing similar business and having similar assets;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BACKGROUND-COLOR: WHITE; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 6%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; WIDTH: 7%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	i.
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	without Party A&rsquo;s prior written consent, they shall not acquire or consolidate with any third party, nor shall they invest in any third party;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BACKGROUND-COLOR: WHITE; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 6%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; WIDTH: 7%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	j.
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	they shall promptly notify Party A of any pending or threatened lawsuit, arbitration or administrative dispute which involve Party C&rsquo;s assets, business or incomes;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BACKGROUND-COLOR: WHITE; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 6%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; WIDTH: 7%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	k.
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	without Party A&rsquo;s prior written consent, they shall not distribute any dividends to the shareholders in any manner, and, at Party A&rsquo;s request, they shall promptly distribute all distributable dividends to the shareholders; and
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BACKGROUND-COLOR: WHITE; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 6%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; WIDTH: 7%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	l.
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	at Party A&rsquo;s request, they shall appoint, and appoint only, the directors of the company who are nominated by Party A;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BACKGROUND-COLOR: WHITE; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 6%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(2)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Party B undertakes that:
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BACKGROUND-COLOR: WHITE; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 6%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; WIDTH: 7%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	a.
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	apart from relevant provisions in the Equity Interest Pledge Agreement between Party A and Party B, without Party A&rsquo;s prior written consent, it shall not sell, transfer, mortgage or otherwise dispose of its lawfully acquired equity interest in Party C; nor shall it place encumbrances on such equity interest that would affect the security interest of Party A ;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BACKGROUND-COLOR: WHITE; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 6%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; WIDTH: 7%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	b.
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	in addition to complying with relevant provisions in the Equity Interest Pledge Agreement between Party A and Party B, it shall cause the directors appointed by it not to approve any sell, transfer, mortgage or otherwise disposal of its lawfully acquired equity interest in Party C, nor shall it place encumbrances on such equity interests that would affect the security interests of Party A;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BACKGROUND-COLOR: WHITE; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 6%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; WIDTH: 7%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	c.
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	it shall cause the Party C&rsquo;s directors appointed by it not to approve any acquisition of, any consolidation with, or any investment in any third party without Party A&rsquo;s prior written consent;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>

<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 6%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; WIDTH: 7%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	d.
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	it shall promptly notify Party A of any pending or threatened lawsuit, arbitration or administrative dispute involving its equity interests in Party C;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BACKGROUND-COLOR: WHITE; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 6%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; WIDTH: 7%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	e.
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	it shall cause Party C&rsquo;s directors appointed by it to vote for the equity transfer contemplated herein;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BACKGROUND-COLOR: WHITE; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 6%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; WIDTH: 7%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	f.
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	without Party A&rsquo;s prior written consent, it shall prohibit from committing any act or omission that would materially affect Party C&rsquo;s assets, business or liabilities;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BACKGROUND-COLOR: WHITE; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 6%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; WIDTH: 7%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	g.
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	it shall appoint, and appoint only, Party C&rsquo;s directors that are nominated by Party A;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BACKGROUND-COLOR: WHITE; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 6%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; WIDTH: 7%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	h.
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	to the extent permitted by the laws of China, and at any time upon Party A&rsquo;s request, it shall promptly and unconditionally transfer all of its equity interest in Party C to Party A or a third party designated by Party A, and cause Party C&rsquo;s other shareholders to waive their rights of first refusal with respect to such transfer;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BACKGROUND-COLOR: WHITE; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 6%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; WIDTH: 7%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	i.
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	to the extent permitted by the laws of China, and at any time upon Party A&rsquo;s request, it shall cause Party C&rsquo;s shareholders to promptly and unconditionally transfer all of their equity interests in Party C to Party A or a third party designated by Party A, and waiver their rights of first refusal with respect to such transfer; and
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BACKGROUND-COLOR: WHITE; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 6%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; WIDTH: 7%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	j.
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	it shall strictly comply with the provisions of this Agreement, the Equity Pledge Agreement and the Loan Agreement and effectively perform its obligations hereunder and thereunder, and shall be prohibited from committing any act or omission which may affect the validity or enforceability of the above agreements.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BACKGROUND-COLOR: WHITE; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 6%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">

	3.
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>

	Taxes and Fees
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>

</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 24.5PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 24.5PT">
	The Parties shall pay, in accordance with
	relevant Chinese laws, their respective equity transfer and registration taxes and other charges arising from their preparation
	and execution of this Agreement and the Equity Transfer Agreement and the completion of the transactions contemplated herein and
	therein.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>

	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 24.5PT">
	Unless there is a written notice regarding
	change of address, all notices relating to this Agreement shall be addressed in accordance with the following and delivered by
	personal delivery, fax or registered mail. If notice is given through registered mail, the date on the confirmation slip shall
	be deemed the date of delivery. If notice is given by personal delivery or via fax, the date of actual receipt shall be deemed
	the date of delivery. In the case of delivery via fax, the original copy of the notice shall be sent to the following relevant
	address by personal delivery or by registered mail.
</P>

</B>

<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;

<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 6%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(1)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	This Agreement shall be governed by and interpreted in accordance with the laws of the People&rsquo;s Republic of China.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BACKGROUND-COLOR: WHITE; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 6%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(2)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Disputes in connection with or arising out of the performance
	of this Agreement shall first be resolved through consultation between the Parties. If a dispute cannot be resolved within 30
	days after consultation begins, either Party may bring the dispute to the China International Economic and Trade Arbitration
	Commission in Beijing for arbitration under the auspices of three arbitrators designated in accordance with its rules. The
	arbitration award shall be final and binding upon the Parties.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BACKGROUND-COLOR: WHITE; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">

<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 6%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(3)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Except the matters in dispute, the Parties shall continue to perform other provisions hereof pending the resolution of the dispute.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>

<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BACKGROUND-COLOR: WHITE; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 6%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(1)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	This Agreement shall be concluded after the signatures or seals of the Parties are affixed to it. The Parties agree that this Agreement will become effective as of the execution date. The term of this Agreement shall be ten years starting from the effective date. Unless Party A terminates this Agreement by written notice three months before the expiration of the term, this Agreement shall automatically be renewed for a term of another ten years.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>

	(2)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">

</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>

</FONT>

	Any amendment or supplement hereto shall not be valid without a written agreement between the Parties.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>

</FONT>
</TD>

<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE">

</FONT>

</FONT>

<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE">

<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;

<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	Agent&nbsp;
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE">
